articles.title: Airtel Africa Records 82% On-year Increase In Profits For Fy22 | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The Bharti Airtel subsidiary clocked an 82% increase in net profit to $755 million for FY22 compared to the previous financial year, while revenues grew by 20.6% to $4.7 billion in FY22 from $3.9 billion in FY21, the company said in a statement Wednesday.
